name: Blockade (itch) (TSaar, Parah)
description:
Created for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Reach the green goal tile before running out of action points! Moving around and using abilities costs action points. Each of your die faces enables you to use the corresponding ability. The cost and range of the ability changes depending on the face of the die. Use your abilities wisely to defeat enemy red blocks, move past obstacles and reach the goal!

The game has 13 levels in total. 

INPUTS

W,A,S,D / Left mouse - Move / select direction

1,2,3,4,5,6 - Use ability

R- Restart

ESC - Pause  / Menu
